title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 158.6 - Allowable expenditures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 158.6 - Allowable expenditures

State Regulations

Education and community renewal program and training grant
funds may be expended for the salaries and benefits of a program coordinator or
other staff directly assigned to the program, reasonable travel expenses for
purposes of training, supplies and materials, defraying the reasonable expenses
resulting from the use of school facilities by community groups, the operation
of an advisory council, minor remodeling of facilities and other such
expenditures approved by the commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
158.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
